title: Apothecarius Argentum, Vol. 1
description: The new CMX series Apothecarious Argentum puts a unique spin on the medieval fantasy genre. Argentum was raised to be a poison tester for a royal family. As he grew up, he developed an unusual immunity towards toxic substances and later became a master chemist with the ability to cure any illness. Returning to the kingdom after a long absence, he is assigned to be Princess Prima's bodyguard. But any relationship that might develop between the two will have its limits; Argentum's very touch has itself become poisonous.
author: Tomomi Yamashita
